title: Golden Kamuy 2nd Season OVA
title_jp: ゴールデンカムイ OAD
synopsis:
1. Koi wo Shita kara Datsugoku Suru Koto ni Shita/Kyoufu no Moudoku Dai Shitou! Hokkaido Ouchi ni Kyodai Hebi wa Sonzai Shita! (Love Made Me Escape from Prison/The Terrifying Battle of Deadly Poison! A Massive Snake Deep in the Hokkaido Wilderness!)
2. Monster
3. Shiton Doubutsuki

episodes.nome: I Fell in Love, and That`s Why I Decided to Escape / A Life and Death Battle vs. the Horrifying Deadly Venom! Deep in the Forests of Hokkaido, a Massive Serpent Lurks!
